# Tender Announcement: External Reporting

## [Guidance] External Reporting (MX-43084325270)
### [Classification] *SRV (Services Rendered)

## Request for Proposals (RFP)
The Farm Credit Canada (FCC) invites service providers to bid on a project to develop an external reporting system that will protect the identity of employees and customers who disclose wrongdoing.

## Background
In compliance with the Public Servants Accountability Act, the FCC is required to maintain confidentiality of disclosures made by employees and customers. Currently, the organization uses a third-party vendor to manage anonymous disclosures, while in-house management applies when the FCC Ethics Office receives a disclosure. We are interested in exploring a combined process for managing disclosures.

## Tender Overview
The successful bidder will be responsible for:
- Designing and developing an external reporting system that integrates both in-house and third-party management processes.
- Providing technical support and maintenance for the developed system.

## More Information
This Request for Proposal is available on Merx.com ([Disclosures] <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2863157661/abstract?language=EN> EN, [Disclosures] <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2863157661/abstract?language=FR> FR). Click on the link to access the opportunity. A fee may be applied; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
